sentences.en: He gave the donkey a whack across the back with his stick.
sentences.cn: 他拿棍子朝驴背上狠狠打了一下。

sentences.en: He gave the girl at the desk the message.
sentences.cn: 他把便条递给了桌旁的女孩。

sentences.en: He uncoiled the hose and gave them a thorough drenching.
sentences.cn: 他把软管铺展开来，把它们彻底冲洗了一下。

sentences.en: I gave her a lift back out to her house.
sentences.cn: 我让她搭我的便车回家。

sentences.en: In the interview he gave some grounds for optimism.
sentences.cn: 他接受采访时阐述了持乐观态度的理由。

sentences.en: Michael gave him a dirty look and walked out.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔狠狠地瞪了他一眼然后走开了。

sentences.en: She gave him a quick, upward look, then lowered her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她抬眼迅速瞥了他一下，然后眼睛又垂了下去。

sentences.en: She gave him an extra scoop of clotted cream.
sentences.cn: 她多给他加了一勺浓缩奶油。

sentences.en: The crew of the ship gave them nothing but bread to eat.
sentences.cn: 船上的工作人员除了面包什么也不给他们吃。

sentences.en: The doctors gave numerous examples of patients being expelled from hospital.
sentences.cn: 医生们列举了大量病人被逐出医院的实例。

sentences.en: The news gave a fillip to the telecommunications sector.
sentences.cn: 这个消息给电信部门注入了一针强心剂。

sentences.en: The violence in her tone gave Alistair a shock.
sentences.cn: 她语气之强烈令阿利斯泰尔深感震惊。

sentences.en: There was a splintering sound as the railing gave way.
sentences.cn: 围栏倒下时发出了断裂的声音。

sentences.en: There was pandemonium in court as the judge gave his summing-up.
sentences.cn: 法官的结案陈词在法庭上引起一片混乱。

sentences.en: We gave the gate money to the St John Ambulance brigade.
sentences.cn: 我们将门票收入都捐给了圣约翰急救队。

phrases.tran_cn: 牺牲自己的时间和精力；腾出时间和力量来帮助别人
增减……而无大变化；允许有小误差
分发，发出；公布，发表；用尽，精疲力竭
放弃；对…表示绝望；对…不再期待

trans.tran_cn: 给予，赠送( give的过去式 )，（与名词连用描述某一动作，意义与该名词相应的动词相同），供给，交给
